For a LIMITED AMOUNT OF PEOPLE only, 10 LowEndTalk users will receive a 50% discount code to use on our enterprise or business shared hosting packages.

COUPON RULES:
Valid for new customers only.
Valid only once per client.

COUPON: LET50OFF - For a LIMITED AMOUNT OF PEOPLE only, only new customers can receive a 50% recurring discount on our enterprise or business shared hosting packages. (10 Clients Only)

COUPON: LET10OFF - For new customers, you can receive a 10% recurring discount on any of our shared hosting packages. (Unlimited Clients)

COUPON: LETBIZ - For new customers, you can receive a 20% recurring discount on our business shared hosting package. (Unlimited Clients)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHAT'S INCLUDED IN ALL ACCOUNTS


OUR FAST AND OPTIMISED SERVICES COME WITH ONLY THE BEST OF FEATURES.


Turbo Boosted Servers
Our unique combination of enterprise hardware and superior software delivers an unparalleled performance. We also use LiteSpeed on our servers, which has proven to be 9x faster than Apache.



DDos Protection
Our network is monitored 24/7 for attacks to provide you with the best uptime possible. With Anti-DDos Mitigation/Protection in place, your website is secure from majority of DDos attacks.




Instant Activation
All our hosting packages are activated immediately upon successful payment, cutting down on the time needed to get your website online.





No Hidden Fees
No Hidden setup, activation or cancellation fees. Everything is plain and simple.




One Click Application Installer
We provide you with a fast one-click software installer to install your favorite scripts and applications.



Control Panel
All our shared hosting packages come with the well known cPanel included with it. This makes setting up and managing your website a piece of cake.
